title: Totally Pucked
description: Ever hear the story about the gal who got dumped with this parting shot? “And, maybe you need some lessons in the bedroom.”Sure, I wanted to shout at my “You suck in bed too.”But I’m a lady. I didn’t say that.I do, however, share the whole sorry story over drinks to my best guy friend—the hockey star who’s been my bestie forever.And he’s suddenly intensely curious about these bedroom lessons. He’s so damn interested, he says, “I’d be willing to be your test subject.”If I say yes, it'll change our lifelong friendship in the next twenty-four hours…
author: Lauren Blakely
